## Overview
Basic Stencil component created with bit

#### Example

Usage example:

```js
import '@frontend/stencil.my-component/my-component.tsx';

<my-component first="First" middle=", middle" last=", last"></my-component>

```

Live example

```js live=true
<my-component first="First" middle=", middle" last=", last"></my-component>
```
